Before Arrival¶

Harvard RC server¶

  • Get account (with your own email as external collaborator)

    • RC account

      • no need for VPN
      • sanity check: ssh USERNAME@login.rc.fas.harvard.edu
      • access to file system ls /n/pfister_lab/
